texts.biography: Huldra is a beautiful and sweet elf who dwells in the forests near the Wlld Valley and can befriend all the creatures here. And when a stranger enters her territory, Huldra forces him into a trap. She joins the Wlld Valley to repay the people of the Wlld Valley for saving her sisters' lives.
texts.name: Huldra

specialty.description: Keeps the hero from leaving the battlefield (fleeing or surrendering).
specialty.name: Battle no fleeing
specialty.tooltip: Neither hero can escape or surrender
